The Presidio RedCap Project
===========================

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   :maxdepth: 1

   license

Project to interface with the Presidio RedCap Database.


Installation
------------

To install the Presidio RedCap project,
run this command in your terminal:

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install presidio-redcap


Usage
-----

Presidio RedCap's usage looks like:

.. code-block:: console

   $ presidio-redcap [OPTIONS]

.. option:: --version

   Display the version and exit.

.. option:: --help

   Display a short usage message and exit.
